title: This Year At The Razzies, An Award Actors Might Actually Want To Win
teaser: The 35th Annual Razzie nominations are out â€” that not-so-coveted prize for the worst of Hollywood. This year there is a new category, the Redeemer Award, for those stars who have tried so hard and come so far.
